Description: Wheelmade Nile silt goblet with tall ring base, tapering sides, angular profile and rounded simple rim (incomplete). . Covered in red slip interior and exterior, and decorated with three painted slashes in groups around the upper body, featuring two black lines and a white line between.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Faras (Nubia), Meroitic Cemetery Tomb-Group 1/362 Z
